crimm.StructEntities.TopoElements¶

This module defines the TopoEntity class and its subclasses Bond, Angle, Dihedral, and Improper.

Classes

Angle(atom1, atom2, atom3[, param])

An Angle object represents an angle between three Atoms within a Topology.

AngleTuple

alias of Angle

Bond(atom1, atom2[, bond_type, param])

A Bond object represents a bond between two Atoms within a Topology.

BondTuple

alias of Bond

CMap(dihe1, dihe2[, param])

CmapTuple

alias of CMap

DiheTuple

alias of Dihedral

Dihedral(atom_i, atom_j, atom_k, atom_l[, param])

A Dihedral object represents a dihedral angle between four Atoms within a Topology.

ImprTuple

alias of Improper

Improper(atom_i, atom_j, atom_k, atom_l[, param])

A Dihedral object represents a dihedral angle between four Atoms within a Topology.

TopoEntity()

A TopoEntity is a base class for Topology entities such as Bonds, Angles, Dihedrals, and Impropers.

crimm
